thread.title_full: Jennifer Lopez gushes about her ex Drake at the Grammys | Daily Mail Online

author: Sarah Sotoodeh For Dailymail.Com
title: Jennifer Lopez gushes about her ex Drake at the Grammys | Daily Mail Online
text: Drake is currently overseas in Manchester, England; he texted Chance the Rapper a congratulatory text after he won a Grammy for best rap performance - which Chance shared on his Instagram. Jennifer and Drake had no drama over their split, according to People . The magazine's source said that their relationship was 'never very serious.' Having some fun: Jennifer seen on stage with the show's host James Corden What a vision: Jennifer paired the stunning lavender gown with sparkling Mary Jane heels What a lady! The star wore diamond rings and a bracelet for a glittering touch So nice: Drake is currently overseas in Manchester, England; he texted Chance the Rapper a congratulatory text after he won a Grammy for best rap performance Blast from the past: The 47-year-old said 'Of course. I love Drake,' when asked by E! host Ryan Seacrest about him Rumors of a romance began in December, after Drake was seen attending Jennifer's Las Vegas show on two different occasions. People also reported that the Hotline Bling artist gave the actress a Tiffany's necklace worth $100,000. They were also seen enjoying dates at Catch LA and Nobu since they were first linked together late last year. Glowing: Jennifer looked incredible in a revealing purple dress, which had a plunging neckline and a deep thigh slit Amazing: Rumors of a romance began in December, after Drake was seen attending Jennifer's Las Vegas show on two different occasions; seen at the Grammys on Sunday in LA Fabulous: Jennifer showed off her incredible curves in the barely there frock Catching up: While on the carpet, Jennifer posed with Keith Urban; they were both judges on American Idol together Having some fun: She took part in a skit with James during the show GRAMMY AWARDS 2017 WINNERS
